name: Ocean Fishdoms Fishing Games
description:
Dive deep into an all new Match 3 masterpiece.
Ocean Fishd with Match 3 madness infused with a frenzy of fishy puzzles, itís guaranteed to be the most FREE fun youíve ever had on your devices!
Raise and feed adorable fish in their beautiful aquarium homes
- Distinctive gameplay fusion: Match 3 and fish raising
- Challenge hundreds of fantastically fun Match 3 levels
- Feed dozens of extraordinarily diverse 3D fish
- Collect hundreds of exquisite decorations

Thank you for playing! We are happy to delight you.
